content.main_text: Learn to recognize dishes based on their images.
content.section_1_content: Visual recognition of dishes is essential in modern dining services.
content.section_2_content: Each dish typically has a unique visual presentation.
content.section_3_content: Recognizing dishes from images helps with quicker service and reduces errors.
